旞字的基本解释

旞
suì
古代的一种旗子，系着完整的五色羽毛，插在导车上：“全羽为旞，析羽为旌。”

旞字的汉语字典释义

[①]［suì］
［《廣韻》徐醉切，去至，邪。］
古代导车所载旗杆上系有完整五彩鸟羽为装饰物的旗。

旞字的康熙字典解释

【卯集下】【方字部】　旞； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页485第16
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?徐醉切，音遂。【說文】導車所以載全羽以爲允。允，進也。【周禮·春官·司常】全羽爲旞。【又】道車載旞。【註】道車象路也。

考證：〔【又】道車建旞。〕　謹照周禮原文建旞改載旞。

暂无。

Zhi
Basic explanation of words
Zhi
suì
An ancient flag, tied with a complete five-color feather, is inserted on the guide car: "A whole feather is a flamboyant, and a feather is a banner."
Zhi
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［suì］
["Guang Yun" Xu Zui cut, go to the end, evil. ]
The flag pole carried by the ancient guided vehicle is decorated with a flag with a complete colorful bird feather.
Zhi
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Mao Jixia】【Fangzi Department】　旞; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 485 16
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Positive Rhyme]? Xu Zui cut, and the sound is complete. [Said the text] The guide car so carried Quan Yu thought it was allowed. Yun, Jin Ye. 【Zhou Li·Chun Guan·Si Chang】Quan Yu is Min. [Also] Dao Car Min. [Note] Every car is like a road.
